attributes.action: Blockade all Iranian waters until the 15 British naval personnel are released.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Blockade all Iranian waters, stopping all seaborn imports and exports, until the 15 British personnel are released. During this time, if any Iranian naval vessels venture out of port they should be intercepted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
